summary:
Deep understanding of the principles in the areas of financial risk management, quantitative methods, macro and microeconomics, financial analysis and reporting (GAAP and IAS), corporate finance, portfolio management, equity, fixed income and derivative markets
Advanced User of computer (Excel, Word, Access, PowerPoint, MS Project, Basic, OLAP). Trading platforms: Blackwood, Lightspeed, Instaquote, ROX. 
Informational systems: Kondor Radius (Reuters), Focus DMT, Bloomberg, Reuters Xtra 3000

Specialties: Risk management, collateral management, brokerage, Fixed income equity and derivatives valuation
